languages.text: {n}Владайм смотрит только на вас.{/n} "Если уж ты собираешься меня приговорить, сделай все быстро. Не отдавай меня этой бесноватой стерве". {n}Метко пущенный плевок летит под ноги к Инцендии.{/n}
{n}Vladaym is looking at you and no one else.{/n} "If you're going to sentence me, do it fast. Don't give me to that raving hag." {n}A well-aimed gob of spit lands at Incendia's feet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм смотрит только на вас.{/n} "Если уж ты собираешься меня приговорить, сделай все быстро. Не отдавай меня этой бесноватой стерве". {n}Метко пущенный плевок летит под ноги к Инцендии.{/n}

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆盯着你，完全没有在意其他人。{/n}“如果你打算审判我的话，动作快点，别把我交给那个疯婆子。”{n}他朝因森蒂娅吐了一口口水，精准地落在了她的脚边。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is looking at you and no one else.{/n} "If you're going to sentence me, do it fast. Don't give me to that raving hag." {n}A well-aimed gob of spit lands at Incendia's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆看着你。{/n}“如果你打算审判我的话，动作快点，别把我交给那个疯婆子。”{n}他朝因森蒂娅吐了一口口水，精准地落在了她的脚边。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムはあなただけを見ている。{/n}「もし刑を執行するのなら、素早くやってくれ。あの老婆には引き渡さないでほしい」{n}ヴラダイムはインセンディアの足元目掛けて、大きな唾を吐いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is looking at you and no one else.{/n} "If you're going to sentence me, do it fast. Don't give me to that raving hag." {n}A well-aimed gob of spit lands at Incendia's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムはあなただけを見ている。{/n}「もし刑を執行するのなら、素早くやってくれ。あの老婆には引き渡さないでほしい」{n}ヴラダイムはインセンディアの足元目掛けて、大きな唾を吐いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym solo te mira a ti.{/n} «Si va a sentenciarme, hágalo rápido. No me entregue a esa bruja loca». {n}Un escupitajo preciso cae a los pies de Incendia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is looking at you and no one else.{/n} "If you're going to sentence me, do it fast. Don't give me to that raving hag." {n}A well-aimed gob of spit lands at Incendia's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym solo te mira a ti.{/n} «Si va a sentenciarme, hágalo rápido. No me entregue a esa bruja loca». {n}Un escupitajo cae a los pies de Incendia.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym blickt nur dich an, niemanden sonst.{/n} "Wenn Ihr mich verurteilen wollt, tut es schnell. Händigt mich nicht dieser wahnsinnigen Hexe aus." {n}Ein gut gezielter Klecks Spucke landet vor Incendias Füßen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is looking at you and no one else.{/n} "If you're going to sentence me, do it fast. Don't give me to that raving hag." {n}A well-aimed gob of spit lands at Incendia's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym blickt nur dich an.{/n} "Wenn Ihr mich verurteilen wollt, tut es schnell. Händigt mich nicht dieser wahnsinnigen Hexe aus." {n}Ein gut gezielter Klecks Spucke landet vor Incendias Füßen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Ignorant tout le monde, Vladaym se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Si vous comptez me condamner, dépêchez-vous. Ne me livrez pas à cette harpie sanguinaire. » {n}Un crachat bien placé atterrit aux pieds d'Incendia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is looking at you and no one else.{/n} "If you're going to sentence me, do it fast. Don't give me to that raving hag." {n}A well-aimed gob of spit lands at Incendia's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Si vous comptez me condamner, dépêchez-vous. Ne me livrez pas à cette harpie sanguinaire. » {n}Un crachat bien placé atterrit aux pieds d'Incendia.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, doğrudan sana bakıyor.{/n} "Eğer beni cezalandıracaksan bir an önce yap. Beni bu kudurmuş kocakarıya bırakma." {n}İyi hedeflenmiş bir tükürük kütlesi, İncendia'nın ayağının dibine yapışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym is looking at you and no one else.{/n} "If you're going to sentence me, do it fast. Don't give me to that raving hag." {n}A well-aimed gob of spit lands at Incendia's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym direkt olarak sana bakıyor.{/n} "Eğer beni cezalandıracaksan, bunu bir an önce yap. Beni bu kudurmuş kocakarıya bırakma." {n}İyi hedeflenmiş bir tükürük kütlesi, İncendia'nın ayağının dibine yapışıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
